About Us

AppioLab is an IT Outsourcing and Offshore Development Service providing company based in Dhaka, Bangladesh. AppioLab started its journey by providing outsourcing service in oDesk marketplace from November 2011.

AppioLab was established with core management member and technical team lead Mr. Ariful Haque (aka Ariful H Bhuiyan) and his wife Ms. Salma Sultana Tajia. But they didn't wait long to invite their most trusted and skilled friends, colleagues into their team as they and AppioLab believe in Team Work

At the moment, AppioLab is operated from Kuantan, Malaysia and the full team work as remote team.
